# Decision Title

We need to make this decision already.

## Options

Talk through the different options for this decision.

### Option One

A Description about Option One.

#### Pros

- It comes first
- You don't have to think anymore

#### Cons

- You never go with the first option
- It isn't your idea

### Option Two

A Description about Option Two.

#### Pros

- It is not the first idea
- It is less expensive

#### Cons

- It is not your idea
- If it was a good option why not start with it?
